DOC.brief_summary: Strength training of the hip flexors using elastic bands can induce an effect on isometric hip strength of at least 15 %.
DOC.brief_title: Hip-Flexion Strength Training: Can Elastic Bands Induce a Relevant Effect?
DOC.criteria: Physically active (more than 2.5 h/week) individuals Injury in the lower back or legs within the last 6 months. Systematic strength training of the hip flexors more than once a week within the last 6 months before the study was initiated.
